title: Summer apple salad
ingredients: ['2 shallots, finely sliced', '1 tbsp vegetable oil', '3 Granny Smith apples, cored and sliced', '3 Pink Lady apples, cored and sliced', '1 tbsp lime juice', '6 cherry tomatoes, cut into quarters', '2 tbsp dry roasted peanuts, crushed', 'handful coriander leaves, chopped', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 tsp sugar', '1 tbsp fish sauce', 'juice of 2 limes']
